name: Matching King
description:
Enjoy a variety of modes within our game.
We are ready to game online with the mobile. Challenge players online across the globe.
It will be a boost to your brain. Feel empowered after playing.

[Mission]
Touch a card to flip it and reveal its shape, find the matching shape to clear the cards!

[Features]
- Stage Mode: diverse and unique challenges are ready.
- Arcade Mode: Find same card within the timeout period
- Multiplayer mode: Play the game with others around the world
- Easy one-touch operation
- Leaderboards, achievements, friend Support
- Low musk phones, tablet devices support
